sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ChangeConflictWorker</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ChangeConflictWorker</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ChangeConflictWorker = Class.create();
ChangeConflictWorker.prototype = {
	initialize: function() {
	},

	start: function (sysId, sysClassName) {
		var sourceGR = new GlideRecord(sysClassName || "change_request");
		if (!sourceGR.get(sysId))
			return;

		var ccc = new ChangeCheckConflicts(sourceGR);
		ccc.checkAndUpdate();
	},

    type: 'ChangeConflictWorker'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2015-06-15 08:31:50</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0abd9357efa002008e4c36caa5c0fb16</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>ChangeConflictWorker</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Change Management - Collision Detector" source="com.snc.change.collision">479385476da620100acb70b3534330f0</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0abd9357efa002008e4c36caa5c0fb16</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2016-02-19 11:45:57</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>370</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
